hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="HAAS-hpjdwpd" /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init build small /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init fixup /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'wget https://haas.cesnet.cz/haas.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ###################
/puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh metalib/tests/phase2.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpjdwpd.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpjdwpd/tests/hpjdwpd.sh'
